channel.title: Raven Banner on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Raven Banner on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Roger Corman Reboot ‘Deathstalker’ Closes Major Territories for Raven Banner Before Locarno World Premiere
item.description: LOCARNO, Switzerland — Making good on buzz among buyers at Locarno, the Steven Kostanski-directed and Raven Banner-sold “Deathstalker” has scored major territory pre-sales with Japan and Germany
